body:
Features and Enhancements

Component
  • New: Group Specialty Custom Attributes
    • Network360 now supports the ability to filter on Group Specialty Custom Attributes to make it easier to build Network Models (NBO).
      Note: Additional Group Specialties data are required to utilize this functionality.
    • New Functional Areas:
      • Expanded data import process to support additional Group Specialty data
    • New Screen: Find Groups:
      • Ability to choose and filter criteria AND then, enter parameter values
      • New Attributes Filters: Cost and Quality filters can now help identify relevant Providers
      • Build Groups: Add/Remove one or more Groups for the new Network being modeled by the Client
    • New Provider Screen:
      • Client Users can look at a specific Group
      • Office Location(s) on a map
      • CMS information
      • Review/Add comments to each Group Record via Network360 interface
      • Review Associated Attributes
    • New CSV Export: Choose a Provider and select any or all these fields:
      • Networks
      • Tags
      • Provider Comments (created within Network360)
      • Custom Attributes for that Provider

Issues Fixed

Component
  • IE:11 - Project Data: Market Total
    • Issue Impacts IE:11 ONLY - Market Total link from a project with a lot of Networks can generate a URL that is longer than IE 11 is able to recognize. Fixed
